name: Click City
description:
The main goal is to survive from small village to megaopolis and reach 1 million people.

The project was created in 5 days period during Unity education at PISMO, Novska.

Progammer: Ivan Ivkovic

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski

7 different stages:

  • tribe
  • village
  • medival city
  • global city
  • metropolis
  • megaopolis

You have 6 different buttons for manipulate with economics of game:

  • go to war
  • go to hunt
  • build house
  • go for water
  • mine
  • go for trees
